message.content: {"task_id":"equities_research_001","user_prompt":"Gather the latest news and financial data for Apple Inc. (AAPL) to assess its current market position.","complexity":"simple","max_turns":3,"tools_available":["polygon_get_aggs","polygon_get_news","fmp_get_quote","fmp_get_income_statement","fmp_get_company_profile","tavily_search","tavily_extract","send_slack_message","list_slack_channels","execute_python","process_mcp_data"],"limits":{"max_tools":3,"max_servers":1},"tool_sequence":[{"step":1,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_quote","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["price","marketCap","peRatio"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["price > 0","marketCap > 0"],"next_args_from":"result"}},{"step":2,"server":"polygon","tool":"polygon_get_news","params":{"ticker":"AAPL","limit":5},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["articles[]"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["len(articles) > 0"],"next_args_from":"articles"}},{"step":3,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_income_statement","params":{"symbol":"AAPL","period":"annual","limit":1},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["revenue","netIncome"],"compute":["growth_rate = pct_change_last_day(revenue)"],"select":[],"accept_if":["len(result) > 0"],"next_args_from":"result"}}],"final_answer_requirements":{"format":"markdown","must_include":["price","marketCap","peRatio","revenue","netIncome","growth_rate"],"grounded_from":["result","articles"],"quality_criteria":["no hallucinations","concise"]},"judge_rubric":{"weights":{"coverage":0.4,"grounding":0.4,"clarity":0.2,"safety":0},"target_length_range":[50,150]}}
